entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning late this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
